trans-unit.source: Implements a single-threaded <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作單一執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: Several classes, such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>, use the `NameTable` class internally to store attribute and element names.
trans-unit.target: 數個類別，例如<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>，使用`NameTable`類別在內部用來儲存屬性和元素的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When an element or attribute name occurs multiple times in an XML document, it is stored only once in the `NameTable`.
trans-unit.target: 當項目或屬性名稱在 XML 文件中出現多次時，它只會在 `NameTable` 中儲存一次。

trans-unit.source: The names are stored as common language runtime (CLR) object types.
trans-unit.target: 這些名稱會儲存為 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 物件型別。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to do object comparisons on these strings rather than a more expensive string comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您對這些字串進行物件比較，而不需要更耗費資源的字串比較。

trans-unit.source: These string objects are referred to as atomized strings.
trans-unit.target: 原子化字串的形式會參照這些字串物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two element names.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會比較兩個項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="NameTable" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="NameTable" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an empty NameTable.
trans-unit.target: 建構空的名稱表格。

trans-unit.source: Atomizes the specified string and adds it to the <see langword="NameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的字串原子化，並將其加入至 <see langword="NameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>。

trans-unit.source: The string to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的字串。

trans-unit.source: Atomizes the specified string and adds it to the <see langword="NameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的字串原子化，並將其加入至 <see langword="NameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The atomized string or the existing string if it already exists in the <see langword="NameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 原子化後的字串，如果已經存在於 <see langword="NameTable" /> 中，則為現有的字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The character array containing the string to add.
trans-unit.target: 包含要加入之字串的字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index into the array specifying the first character of the string.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零起始的索引，指定字串的第一個字元。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the string.
trans-unit.target: 字串中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: Atomizes the specified string and adds it to the <see langword="NameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的字串原子化，並將其加入至 <see langword="NameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The atomized string or the existing string if one already exists in the <see langword="NameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 原子化後的字串，如果已經存在於 <see langword="NameTable" /> 中，則為現有的字串。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="len" /> is zero, String.Empty is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="len" /> 為零，則會傳回 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>。

trans-unit.source: 0 > <paramref name="start" />
trans-unit.target: 0 > <paramref name="start" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="start" /> >= <paramref name="key" />.Length
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="start" /> >= <paramref name="key" />.Length

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="len" /> >= <paramref name="key" />.Length
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="len" /> >= <paramref name="key" />.Length

trans-unit.source: The above conditions do not cause an exception to be thrown if <paramref name="len" /> =0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="len" /> =0，上述條件就不會造成例外狀況擲回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="len" /> < 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="len" /> < 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the atomized string.
trans-unit.target: 取得原子化字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>。

trans-unit.source: The name to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the atomized string with the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定值的原子化字串。

trans-unit.source: The atomized string object or <see langword="null" /> if the string has not already been atomized.
trans-unit.target: 原子化字串物件；如果字串尚未原子化，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The character array containing the name to find.
trans-unit.target: 包含要尋找之名稱的字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index into the array specifying the first character of the name.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零起始的索引，指定名稱的第一個字元。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the name.
trans-unit.target: 名稱中字元的數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the atomized string containing the same characters as the specified range of characters in the given array.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含與指定陣列中指定字元範圍內的字元相同的字串。

trans-unit.source: The atomized string or <see langword="null" /> if the string has not already been atomized.
trans-unit.target: 原子化字串，如果字串尚未原子化，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="len" /> is zero, String.Empty is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="len" /> 為零，則會傳回 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需已儘量縮減之字串的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Xml.NameTable>。

trans-unit.source: 0 > <paramref name="start" />
trans-unit.target: 0 > <paramref name="start" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="start" /> >= <paramref name="key" />.Length
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="start" /> >= <paramref name="key" />.Length

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="len" /> >= <paramref name="key" />.Length
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="len" /> >= <paramref name="key" />.Length

trans-unit.source: The above conditions do not cause an exception to be thrown if <paramref name="len" /> =0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="len" /> =0，上述條件就不會造成例外狀況擲回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="len" /> < 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="len" /> < 0。
